official.headline: System Service Interruption
official.anchor_line: Temporary disruptions to the Behavioral Compliance Index have been swiftly contained, ensuring essential services remain operational.
official.contextual_reframing: Ongoing infrastructure improvements guarantee public safety and efficient citywide response. Citizens can trust in proactive system management.

official.headline: Collective Civic Participation
official.anchor_line: Community forums are underway as residents demonstrate unity and constructive engagement across city zones.
official.contextual_reframing: Public involvement supports transparent governance and strengthens our advanced civic infrastructure.

official.headline: Technological Renewal Continues
official.anchor_line: Stenograd’s automated systems have resumed synchronized function following routine maintenance protocols.
official.contextual_reframing: These technical advances reinforce our commitment to seamless urban living and the continuous evolution of public services.

underground.headline: Systems Shaken
underground.anchor_line: BCI glitches spark chaos — citizens blocked, denied, left in limbo while leaders stay silent.
underground.contextual_reframing: The Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, scores and controls every life in Stenograd. Now, even the tech is cracking under the weight of hidden sabotage and power grabs.

underground.headline: Secrets Unleashed
underground.anchor_line: Leaked BCI records expose years of quiet targeting and algorithmic punishment under Halden's watch.
underground.contextual_reframing: Internal logs show real people flagged as 'noncompliant,' shut out of work and home by silent digital hands. So much for Humane Infrastructure.

underground.headline: Council Collapse
underground.anchor_line: The Council fractures as free zones demand justice, tired of recycled lies and shadow rule.
underground.contextual_reframing: Stenograd’s executive Council always hid behind numbers and secrecy. Now, with the system exposed, no faction can hold control as the people push back.
